section.title: Alternative Approaches
section.para: The first section of this chapter needs to introduce the conceptual model of design flood estimation techniques - this will be an expansion of the initial sections of the IAHR paper on revisiting the design flood problem. Included in this section therefore is the presentation of the design flood problem as a data mining problem (i.e. a hydroinformatic problem) where a statistical model is fitted to relevant data; this data can be the result of field monitoring, regional regression, or catchment simulation. This needs to be carefully framed as it forms the foundation of the approach being adopted in later sections.
